doc.title: Outlook Good
doc.plot: A geeky, hopeless romantic named Lucky, is a loser in the game life until one day his luck changes-and he comes into money. He uses the money to try and get the woman of his dreams with it. After purchasing a fancy car, clothes, and coming up with a new, fake, personality, he realizes he is trying to buy love and be someone he isn't. Lucky gives up his bad idea and tries to win the woman's love with his REAL persona and fails...After his failed last attempt, he sees Daisy, his cute co-worker who's heart had been won by him a long time ago! Only THIS time he actually sees her and his luck REALLY changes!
